title: Russell Wilson on Donald Trump & National Protests | The Chuck Powell Show | Seattle's Sports Radio 950 KJR
text: Russell Wilson on Donald Trump & National Protests posted by Jackson Felts - — Sam HawkBadger (@hwkbgr) January 31, 2017 Chuck Powell comes to Seattle and KJR as a 20-year veteran of radio.The Illinois-born broadcaster began his career in Las Vegas but has spent the majority of his adulthood in Phoenix, where he worked two years as a news talk host at KTAR and seven years as host of a comedic morning show, “The Morning Ritual”. Of course, the majority of Powell’s career has been spent in sports radio. He was a national sports radio host in Las Vegas for Sports Fan Radio Network, a local host at KGME in Phoenix and a frequent contributor to Arizona Diamondbacks telecasts. Contact
